titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Broghil, and the officers of the army of Ireland in the province of Munster
titleStmt.author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.
Ireland. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bladen, by special order ;
and re-printed at London by John Macock,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Broghill." i.e., Roger Boyle, Earl of Orrery [and 42 others].
A request for the restoration of the secluded members of Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
